thread.title: Click to Buy: Some Sears Stores Are Being Auctioned Online

author: Esther Fung
title: Click to Buy: Some Sears Stores Are Being Auctioned Online
text:
Troubled department-store chain Sears Holdings Corp. is looking to cash in on real estate, and some of its stores could be sold online.
Real estate services firm Cushman & Wakefield is partnering with Real Insight Marketplace, an online auction platform, to help Sears sell 16 profitable store locations. The stores, 15 of which are attached to malls, are being marketed as sale and lease-back deals, and some properties with agreements that allow modifications could be turned into self-storage, hotel or residential space.
